SCTX:
Begin ColonyRootTimer

short currentday
short dayspassed

if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_10" >= 100 )
	if ( dayspassed == 0 )
		set currentday to day
		set dayspassed to 1
	endif
	if ( dayspassed <= 2 )
		if ( currentday != day )
			set dayspassed to dayspassed + 1 
			set currentday to day
		endif
	endif
	if ( dayspassed > 2 )
		set dayspassed to 0
		StopScript ColonyRootTimer
	endif
endif


End
